name: URL Shortener by Shortez.
author: URL Shortener

sections.installation:
Upload .zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and extract it
Active the plugin through the Plugins Menu in your WordPress.
Good job you done, now Create your own short URLs.

Options

Once installed Shortez, Go to Settings > shortez settings and configure your api.
sections.description:
What is Shortez?

Shortez.com is a newly launched Israel based link shortener service, it pays to shorten and share urls. Like other url shorteners Shortez also provides some good features to all its users, like good customer support, good referral program, quick signup option, multiple tools, daily payments etc.

How many Shortez Pay

look into https://shortez.com/payout-rates

Features

Allowed/No Allowed Domain

If you have links with Domain.com then in the settings you put in the blacklist Domain.com and then the plugin will not short this domain.

create Short Links

Create short links that your visitors will redirect to a Short link and not for a Long url.

Make Money

In our service you just signup for the website and start make money online with us, without doing anything only redirect links to your short links.

Customizable

You can customize your short links easy with us.

Easy to Use

URL Shortener could not be eaiser to use, Just quick click and you generate links to any posts on your site!

Installation Instructions

Active the plugin through the Plugins Menu in your WordPress.

Options

Once installed Shortez, Go to Settings > shortez settings and configure your api.
